frontmatter.title: Blockquote
frontmatter.description: The blockquote element is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

frontmatter.title: Heading
frontmatter.description: The heading element is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

frontmatter.title: Hr-line (Divider)
frontmatter.description: The `<hr />` tag in HTML stands for horizontal rule and is used to insert a horizontal rule or a thematic break in an HTML page to divide or separate document sections.
